002151.SZ.summary: Beijing BDStar Navigation Co., Ltd. provides satellite navigation, and positioning products and services worldwide. asic products, automotive electronics, special application, and industry applications & operational services. The company provides high precision and navigation products, such as GNSS SoC chips, modules, and boards; GNSS antennas, including survey, choke ring, aviation, Helix/UAV, beacon, smart, and OEM antennas, as well as H-RTK GNSS modules; and wireless data links comprising OEM modems, external radios, and accessories. It also offers iridium antennas; mobile base station antennas, including regular base station and integrative concealment antennas; and RF passive components comprising low and high temperature co-fired, and microwave dielectric ceramics; and soft magnetism ferrite materials. In addition, the company provides passive, active, monopole/dipole, and special antennas; GNSS, CATV, Bluetooth, and WIFI modules; and ceramic substrates comprising LTCC, HTCC, and composite substrates. Further, it offers automotive electronic products, such as infotainment system, reconfigurable instrument cluster, heads-up display, and T-BOX; and automotive engineering services, including automotive electronics testing and verification engineering, and software development services, as well as services for driving assistance, infotainment, and related systems. The company's products are used in various applications, such as measuring, mapping, mechanical control, vehicle monitoring, automotive electronics, precision agriculture, aero logical sounding, precision timing, etc. Beijing BDStar Navigation Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002338.SZ.summary: Changchun UP Optotech Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of photoelectric measurement and control equipment, optical materials, and other products in China. Its principal products include TV goniometers, antenna pedestals, photoelectric theodolite optical and mechanical subsystems, aviation/aerospace camera optical and mechanical subsystems, radar antenna pedestals, medical testing instruments, K9 optical glasses, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Changchun, China.

002380.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Sciyon Wisdom Technology Group Co., Ltd.
002380.SZ.summary: Nanjing Sciyon Wisdom Technology Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells industrial automation and informatization products and solutions in China and internationally. The company offers smart control products, such as smart management systems, intelligent safety production management systems, equipment monitoring and accident prediction systems, intelligent maintenance and training systems, intelligent simulation and training systems, manufacturing execution systems, and intelligent manufacturing information systems, as well as smart control center products. It also provides intelligent control products, such as distributed control, digital electro-hydraulic control, failure safe control, intelligent combustion optimization, intelligent ammonia injection zone control, equipment fault diagnosis and early warning, and intelligent operation optimization systems, as well as touch screens, universal/marine turbine controllers, and integrated/medium-scale programmable controllers. In addition, the company offers smart devices comprising intelligent electric actuators, personnel positioning system, condenser online cleaning robots, boiler furnace parameter measurement systems, warehouse empty preheaters, ranging cable systems, air powder parameter measurement, combustion system parameter detection, and optimization control, smart inverters, and AC servo drives. Further, it provides training and other support services. Nanjing Sciyon Wisdom Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002413.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd.
002413.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a civil-military integration enterprise that researches, develops, produces, and sells radar systems, remote sensing, satellite navigation, digital systems, analog simulation, and security storage for space, aviation, and ground industries. It offers wall probing radar, Mini-SAR, the millimeter-wave radar, the phased array radar, and the slope stability radar used in national defense, public security, frontier defense, geological disaster monitoring, regional protection, and automobile active safety. The company is also involved in processing algorithms of multi-source remote sensing data, and anti-radiation remote sensing data processing SOC chips; and provides real-time onboard, ground raw data, and specialized data processing, as well as system integration services. In addition, it provides baseband processing chips, serialization modules, and complete machines used in general and specialized military equipment, as well as signal acquisition, tracking, observation processing, and PVT solution services. Further, the company offers digital design and simulation, experiment verification, performance evaluation, and operational maintenance in the field of radar systems, satellite navigation, and electronic warfare. Additionally, it provides LNA, BUC, microwave frequency conversion, matrix switch, mediation, spectrum monitoring, automatic detection, frequency domain situation, and equipment status monitoring services; and embedded military-use storage devices, secret-related computer storage disks, portable storage devices, and large-scale information storage systems. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Changfa Refrigeration Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd. in November 2015. Jiangsu Leike Defense Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Changzhou, China.

002414.SZ.summary: Wuhan Guide Infrared Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of infrared thermal imaging systems primarily in Asia. The company offers localization cooled and uncooled IR detectors; system integration cores and modules; law enforcement and temperature measurement systems; personal vision products; and automotive thermal imaging obstacle avoidance systems. Its infrared products are used in various applications, including electric power, metallurgy, petrochemical, construction, firefighting, law enforcement, inspection and quarantine, security and surveillance, ADAS night vision system, and others. The company a strategic cooperation agreement with Foresight Autonomous Holdings Ltd. to develop and market Foresight's QuadSight sensor system combined with guide infrared applications to customers in China. Wuhan Guide Infrared Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

002609.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Jieshun Science and Technology Industry Co.,Ltd.
002609.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Jieshun Science And Technology Industry Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells access control and management systems. The company offers car parking management systems and auto pay stations; ultrasonic parking guidance systems; access controllers, access control readers, and access control spare parts; pedestrian and barrier gate systems; and road blockers, as well as all-in-one card, turnstile with ESD testing, biological recognition, and card retriever solutions. It provides its products under the JSST brand. The company has operations in approximately 100 countries and areas worldwide. Shenzhen Jieshun Science And Technology Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002658.SZ.summary: Beijing SDL Technology Co.,Ltd. develops and sells environmental monitoring, environmental information system, and process analysis products in China. The company offers environmental monitoring system products, such as continuous emission, waste incineration, ambient air quality, and online monitoring systems; and process analytics system products, including gas analytics systems. It also provides infrared and explosion-proof gas, paramagnetic oxygen, and thermal conductivity analyzers; moisture and electrochemical oxygen analyzers; and particle concentration analyzers. In addition, the company offers software products. Its products are used in environmental, power, cement, iron and steel, air separation, and petrochemical industries. Beijing SDL Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002766.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Soling Industrial Co.,Ltd provides car networking hardware and software services. Its products include MWR, HUD, rear-view mirror, ADAS, DVR, back seat infotainment device, TPMS, 360 monitor, telematics, bcaking camera, full LCD cluster, MIFI, t-box, OBD, IVI, and anti-fatigue system. The company offers IVI systems for passenger car infotainment systems and commercial vehicle products; and tire pressure monitoring systems. It also provides IOV management platform for vehicle data monitoring, fault reminder, location tracking, in-car entertainment, maintenance reminder, location sharing, electric vehicle management, vehicle remote control, collision reminder, real-time detection, car friends group, address book interaction, electric vehicle international and landmark docking, and overall security management. The company offers its products to approximately 30 provinces and cities in China; and approximately 60 countries and regions in Europe, the United States, and Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002829.SZ.summary: Beijing StarNeto Technology Co.,Ltd. provides navigation, measurement, and control products in China. The company offers inertial navigation products, such as MEMS and fiber combination products; gyro, satellite positioning, and guided products; attitude measurement products, including tilt sensors and electronic compass; smart driving test products, such as ETS, kao kao, practice and practice solutions, base stations, driving systems, and testable products; and photoelectric pods, photoelectric tracking devices, radar servo turntables, and photoelectric pod control units. It also provides satellite communications solutions, including ship loading, car moving through, portable communication stations, and airborne transmission solutions, as well as system integration services; radar products, such as security systems, wireless communication systems, and miss distance measurement radars; and infrared cameras, meteorological and underwater sound detection products, Netherlands XSENS products, and MTi products. The company serves clients in defense, emergency communications, intelligent transportation, marine mapping, geographic mapping, and other industries. Beijing StarNeto Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.

002870.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd.
002870.SZ.summary: Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of medium- to high-end weighing apparatuses for home and commercial use, and health and movement measurement products. It operates through Measuring Devices, Weighing Apparatuses, and Health and Movement Information Measurement Products segments. The company's products include price computing scales, electronic platform scales, digital weighing scales, dial spring scales, weighing indicators, smart personal scales, activity trackers, baby scales, body analyzers, kitchen scales, body fat scales, luggage scales, and health monitor scales. It operates in China, Europe, North America, and Southeast Asia. Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. sells its products through a network of own stores, electronic channels, and retail chains, as well as direct selling facilities. The company was formerly known as Senssun Weighing Apparatus Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. in January 2008. Guangdong Senssun Weighing Apparatus Group Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

01H.F.summary: HORIBA, Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive test, process and environmental, medical-diagnostics, semiconductor, and scientific instruments and systems. Its Automotive Test Systems segment offers emission measurement systems, driveline test systems, automotive emissions analyzers, engine test and brake test systems, and fuel cell and battery test systems; provides vehicle development engineering and testing engineering services; and leases and manages R&D facilities. The company's Process & Environmental Instruments & Systems segment provides stack gas analyzers, industrial water quality analyzers, water quality analysis and examination systems, air pollution analyzers, environmental radiation monitors, and process measurement equipment. Its Medical-Diagnostic Instruments & Systems segment offers hematology and CRP, immunology, clinical chemistry, and blood glucose analyzers. The company's Semiconductor Instruments & Systems segment provides mass flow controllers, chemical concentration monitors, reticle/mask particle detection systems, residual gas analyzers, and vaporizers. Its Scientific Instruments & Systems segment offers Raman spectrometers, pH meters, particle-size distribution analyzers, X-Ray fluorescence analyzers, elemental analyzers, fluorescence spectroscopy/fluorescence lifetime spectroscopy, optical components, spectrometers and detectors, and gratings. HORIBA, Ltd. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

0C5.F.summary: exactEarth Ltd. provides maritime vessel data for ship tracking and maritime situational awareness solutions worldwide. It offers exactAIS, a data service that provides access to the automatic identification system (AIS) messages captured by the exactView satellite constellation; exactAIS Archive, which gives customers access to the satellite AIS historical data; and exactEarth ShipView, a Web-based viewing tool that allows users to see all the ship positions. The company also provides exactAIS Geospatial Web Services that allows access to its exactAIS data; exactAIS Density Maps, which deliver vessel pattern analysis by transforming AIS messages into individual geospatial data points; exactTrax service that racks fishing boats and small commercial vessels; exactView RT, real-time global satellite-AIS service; and exactAIS Insight, which combines a robust analytics engine with the comprehensive vessel movement dataset. Its products are used in the defense and security, search and rescue, fleet management, financial services, oil and gas, logistics and supply chain, illegal fishing, global vessel monitoring, and environmental protection applications. The company was formerly known as COM DEV Space Systems Ltd. and changed its name to exactEarth Ltd. in June 2009. exactEarth Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Cambridge, Canada.

105840.KS.summary: Woojin Inc. manufactures and sells sensing and measurement related instruments in South Korea. It offers various instruments ranging from the ICI that measures the amount of neutrons, digital indicators, T/C, fast RTDs, and electromagnetic flow meters and recorders for nuclear power plants. The company also provides automation equipment, such as the slag layer measurement device or the FIMT temperature measuring device; condition monitoring systems to predict and prevent unexpected equipment accidents that could occur in industrial areas; and temperature sensors to temperature related fields, including nuclear power, semiconductor, petrochemical, airline, ship construction, geo technology, and genetic engineering. In addition, it develops various materials comprising vibration damping alloys and high silicon cast iron for applications in civil engineering, steel production, and airline and road construction industries. Further, the company offers Vortex, positive displacement, and electromagnetic flow meters to hydroelectric, gas, petrochemical, and other industries. Woojin Inc. is based in Hwaseong, South Korea.

1743.HK.long_name: Zhejiang Cangnan Instrument Group Company Limited
1743.HK.summary: Zhejiang Cangnan Instrument Group Company Limited manufactures and sells gas metering instruments and other related products in People's Republic of China. The company offers gas flowmeters and filters, pressure regulating devices, volume correctors, and flowrate controllers; gas meters, remote wireless diaphragm gas meters, and IC card remote wireless smart controllers; and throttle devices, as well as after sale services. Its products are used in urban gas industry and petroleum systems. The company also exports its products to the United States, Europe, South America, Southeast Asia, and other countries and regions. Zhejiang Cangnan Instrument Group Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.

1GSN.F.summary: Novanta Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, markets, and sells photonics, vision, and precision motion components and sub-systems to original equipment manufacturers in the medical and industrial markets worldwide. Its Photonics segment offers photonics-based solutions, including laser scanning and laser beam delivery, CO2 laser, solid state laser, ultrafast laser, and optical light engine products for photonics-based applications, such as industrial processing, metrology, medical and life science imaging, DNA sequencing, and medical laser procedures. The company's Vision segment provides a range of medical grade technologies, including medical insufflators, pumps, and related disposables; visualization solutions; wireless, recorder and video integration technologies for operating room integrations; optical data collection and machine vision technologies; radio frequency identification technologies; thermal chart recorders; spectrometry technologies; and embedded touch screen solutions. Its Precision Motion segment offers optical and inductive encoders, precision motors, motion control sub-assemblies, servo drives, air bearings, and air bearing spindles. The company sells its products through its direct sales force, resellers, distributors, and system integrators under the Cambridge Technology, Lincoln Laser, Synrad, Laser Quantum, ARGES, WOM, NDS, NDSsi, Med X Change, Reach Technology, JADAK, ThingMagic, Photo Research, General Scanning, Celera Motion, MicroE, Applimotion, Zettlex, Ingenia, and Westwind brands. The company was formerly known as GSI Group, Inc. and changed its name to Novanta Inc. in May 2016. Novanta Inc. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Bedford, Massachusetts.

1KT.F.summary: Keysight Technologies, Inc. provides electronic design and test solutions to commercial communications, networking, aerospace, defense and government, automotive, energy, semiconductor, electronic, and education industries in the Americas, Europe, and the Asia Pacific. Its Communications Solutions Group segment provides electronic design automation (EDA) software; radio frequency and microwave test instruments; hardware and virtual network test platforms and software applications, including data center, routing and switching, software defined networking, security, and encryption; oscilloscopes, logic and serial protocol analyzers, logic-signal sources, arbitrary waveform generators, and bit error rate testers; optical modulation analyzers, optical component analyzers, optical power meters, and optical laser source solutions; and repair, calibration, and consulting services, as well as resells refurbished used Keysight equipment. The company's Electronic Industrial Solutions Group segment offers design tools; design verification solutions; and digital multi-meters, function generators, frequency counters, data acquisition systems, audio analyzers, LCR meters, thermal imagers, precision source measure units, ultra-high precision device current analyzers, and test executive software platforms, as well as various power supplies comprising AC/DC modular supplies and electronically programmable loads. This segment also provides printed-circuit-board-assembly testers, integrated circuit parametric testers, and sub-nano-meter positioning sub-assemblies; test and measurement products and software; and repair, calibration, and consulting services, as well as resells refurbished used Keysight equipment. The company sells its products through direct sales force, distributors, resellers, and manufacturer's representatives. Keysight Technologies, Inc. was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Santa Rosa, California.

1N1.F.summary: Nanalysis Scientific Corp., develops, manufactures, and sells compact nuclear magnetic resonance spectrometers for the pharmaceutical, biotech, chemical, security, food, materials, and education industries. The company sells its instruments in approximately 40 countries. Nanalysis Scientific Corp. was founded in 2009 and is based in Calgary, Canada.

1X1.F.summary: Catapult Group International Limited develops and sells wearable tracking solutions and analytics. It operates through three segments: Wearables, Video Analytics, and New Products. The company offers Vector, a wearable device; ClearSky, a local positioning system; and PLAYERTEK, an analytics solution. It is also involved in developing and selling tactical and coaching technology solutions; and an athlete management platform and analytics solution. The company serves prosumer athletes, sporting teams, leagues, and associations. Catapult Group International Limited was founded in 2006 and is based in Prahran, Australia.

2360.TW.summary: Chroma ATE Inc. designs, assembles, calibrates, manufactures, sells, repairs, and maintains software/hardware for computers and peripherals, computerized automatic test systems, electronic test instruments, signal generators, power supplies, and telecom power supplies under the Chroma brand worldwide. The company provides video and color test solutions; flat panel display test solutions; electrical safety testing solutions; and LED/lighting and driver test solutions. It also offers photovoltaic/inverter test and automation solutions; automated optical inspection solutions; power electronics test solutions; battery test and automation solutions; passive component, electric vehicle, and semiconductor/IC test solutions; PXI test and measurement solutions; and intelligent manufacturing system solutions. In addition, the company provides photonics, and RF and wireless test solutions, as well as turnkey test and automation solutions. Further, it offers warranty, calibration and repair, instrument and test system calibration and repair, customer-site installation, product upgrade, training, technical support, and product support services, as well as replacement parts. The company's products are used in information technology, communication, aerospace, defense, and other industries. Chroma ATE Inc. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2G3.F.summary: Groupe GorgÃ© SA operates in the areas of smart safety systems, protection of high-risk installations, and 3D printing in France, Europe, and internationally. The Smart Safety Systems division develops technological solutions for complex missions in hostile and confined environments for the defense, maritime, aeronautics, nuclear, energy, transportation, and industrial equipment sectors. This division offers mobile underwater, sea, land, and airborne drones, as well as integrated systems; driving and mission training simulators; assembly stations, production and maintenance tools, on-board electronic equipment, and test equipment for aircraft manufacturers, mechatronic repair, and maintenance equipment for aircraft operators; emergency beacons, connectivity gears, and energy conversion systems; ground stations and balloon systems; and electronic equipment. It also provides UMIS, a mine disposal system; UMISOFT, a software suite with actions of unmanned surface vehicles, autonomous underwater vehicles, unmanned airborne vehicles, and remotely operated vehicles; IGUANA, a land mine disposal robot; CAMELEON LG, a land robot; and unmanned autonomous vehicles. Its Protection of High-Risk Installations division provides security and protection products for the oil, gas, nuclear, industrial, and service sectors. This division designs, installs, and maintains fixed active fire protection systems for special risks; and designs, manufactures, and installs passive fire protection systems to protect personnel and equipment in hostile environments. It also offers partition systems, such as special and technical doors, and special walls, as well as related maintenance services. Its 3D Printing division provides 3D printers; and hybrid and composite materials in the form of liquid resins and polymer powders, as well as 3D printed parts primarily for the dental and aerospace sectors. Groupe GorgÃ© SA was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

2KQ.F.summary: Kraken Robotics Inc., a marine technology company, designs, manufactures, and sells software-centric sensors, batteries, and underwater robotic systems for unmanned underwater vehicles used in military and commercial applications. The company offers AquaPix interferometric synthetic aperture sonar (InSAS) for use in onboard autonomous underwater vehicles, remotely operated tow vehicles, remotely operated vehicles, and tow bodies; AquaPix miniature InSAS, an off the shelf configurable InSAS; and SeaVision, a subsea 3D laser imaging system. It also provides KATFISH, an intelligent towed SAS system; ThunderFish, a hovering autonomous underwater vehicle; ALARS, an autonomous launch and recovery system that enablea an unmanned vehicle and its payloads to be brought aboard to a host ship; and DataPod, a removable data storage module for marine applications. In addition, the company offers pressure tolerant encapsulated components, such as batteries, thrusters, actuators, and electronics; and robotics as a service, as well as implements digital signal processing and user interface software for anti-submarine warfare sonar applications. It has operations in Canada, the United States, France, Italy, Israel, the United Kingdom, Germany, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Kraken Sonar Inc. and changed its name to Kraken Robotics Inc. in September 2017. Kraken Robotics Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Mt. Pearl, Canada.

300007.SZ.summary: Hanwei Electronics Group Corporation manufactures and markets gas sensors and instruments in China. It offers carbon monoxide (CO) alarms; gas alarms for CNG, LPG, and CO gas detection; gas shut off valves; vehicle gas alarm systems; and portable gas detectors, including pen type flammable gas detectors, gas leak detectors with feeler poles, single gas detectors, multi-gas detectors, gas sampling pumps, and H2S detectors. The company also provides fixed gas detectors, such as control panels and fixed gas monitors; various alcohol testers and printers; smoke alarms; air purifiers; and water and air quality monitoring equipment. Its products are used in various fields, such as petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, environmental protection, mining, electronics, electricity, pharmaceutical, food, medical health, agriculture, gas, water supply and discharge, heating, municipal engineering, home security and health, public areas, waste gas treatment, sewage treatment, biological sciences, aerospace, military, anti-terrorism, and traffic safety management. The company markets its products in Europe, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, the United States, and South Africa. The company was formerly known as Henan Hanwei Electronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hanwei Electronics Group Corporation in July 2017. Hanwei Electronics Group Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

300114.SZ.long_name: Zhonghang Electronic Measuring Instruments Co., Ltd
300114.SZ.summary: Zhonghang Electronic Measuring Instruments Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic measuring instruments worldwide. It offers strain gages, strain gage based sensors, weighing indicators and software, testing and measuring systems for the aviation industry, automobile performance and environmental detection systems, automobile driver intelligent training systems, remote networking regulatory network platform, on- board weighing control systems, automatic systems, and precision mechanical and electrical control parts, as well as Internet of Things application, and military and civilian use measurement and control products and system solutions. The company's products also include pressure and torque transducers, digital and customized load cells, miniature sensors, accessories, and weighting pads; transmitters and junction boxes; hair spring; welding robot station miniature; hard and brittle material process; assist manipulator; automatic optic; auto-coating machine for two-component glue; and auto load /unload machine for metal sheet in CNC. The company was formerly known as Zhongyuan Electrical Measuring Instruments Factory and changed its name to Zhonghang Electronic Measuring Instruments Co., Ltd in 2002. Zhonghang Electronic Measuring Instruments Co., Ltd was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China.

300165.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Skyray Instrument Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells analytical and measuring instruments worldwide. The company primarily offers instruments in spectroscopy and chromatography fields. Its products are used in various applications, including jewelry, electronics, mineral metallurgy, coating thickness, toy safety, petroleum environment, building, food safety, archaeology, medicine, glass, alloy, and refractory. The company is headquartered in Kunshan, China.

300248.SZ.summary: Newcapec Electronics Co., Ltd. provides smart card applications and solutions in the People's Republic of China. It offers citizen card solutions, public transport solutions, campus one card systems, enterprises one card systems, financial payment solutions, RFID Internet of Things applications, utilities payment systems, and gas management systems. The company also provides electronic payment products, including retail POS terminals, ticket validators, taxi POS, countertop terminals, and kiosks; intelligent recognition products, such as punch clocks, access control readers, access controllers, and electronic door locks; and smart meters comprising prepaid watt-hour meters, prepaid water meters, residential and industrial gas meters, AMR devices, and PLC devices. In addition, it offers RFID devices consisting of E-tags, active RFID readers, UHF desktop card dispensers, UHF remote 4-channel readers, UHF remote integrated readers, Zigbee wireless base stations, and Zigbee modules and routers. The company provides its solutions for smart card applications in cities, schools, colleges, and communities; and other sectors of businesses, including public transportation, sanitation, enterprises, banks, and mobile payment. Newcapec Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, the People's Republic of China.

300338.SZ.long_name: Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd.
300338.SZ.summary: Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells mechanical samplers, sample preparation equipment, and analytical instruments for coal and coke, alternative fuel, food and feed, and environmental applications in the People's Republic of China. It offers calorimeters; and C/H/N elemental, nitrogen/protein, fluorine/chlorine, mercury, sulfur carbon, infrared sulfur, proximate, volatile matter, moisture, and online analyzers, as well as muffle furnaces, and moisture and drying ovens. The company also provides ash fusion determinators, coking coal indices determinators, and hardgrove grindability index testers, as well as spare parts. In addition, offers sample preparation equipment comprising sample preparation systems, pulverizers, sample dividers, sieving shakers, and assisting tools, as well as hammer, jaw, and double roller crushers; and mechanical samplers include cross-belt, and railway and road wagon samplers, and online sample preparation systems. Further, the company provides management and robotic intelligent laboratory systems. The company also exports its products to approximately 60 countries, such as Indonesia, Vietnam, South Africa, Mexico, the Philippines, Thailand, South Korea, Malaysia, Burma, Laos, Australia, India, Ukraine, and the European Union. The company was formerly known as Changsha Kaiyuan Instruments Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. in December 2020. Kaiyuan Education Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

300354.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu DongHua Testing Technology Co., Ltd.
300354.SZ.summary: Jiangsu DongHua Testing Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells structural mechanics performance test systems in China. The company also provides structural mechanics performance tests, such as multi-channel dynamic signal test and analysis systems, stress strain test analysis systems, portable test analysis systems, signal analysis systems, rugged dynamic signal test and analysis systems, wireless signal test and analysis systems, isolated signal test and analysis systems, bridge modal test systems, online monitoring and analysis systems, experimental teaching systems, modal excitation systems, and accessory products. It also offers software products, which include basic analysis, engineering application, order analysis, acoustic analysis, modal analysis, bridge analysis, and secondary development modules, as well as online monitoring software platform. In addition, the company provides sensor products, such as speed, strain, and pressure sensors; accelerometers; motion detectors; and force hammers. Its products are used in scientific research, testing, teaching, equipment manufacturing, and other fields. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jingjiang, China.

300356.SZ.summary: EleFirst Science & Technology Co., Ltd. provides information collection systems in China and internationally. It offers smart grid products, such as electricity information collection system solutions, energy management systems, micro grid systems, distribution network automation system solutions, substation automation system solutions, tools, and other solutions. The company also provides health management solutions, including mobile services for medical authorities, hospitals, government communities, communication operators, radio and television networks, enterprises and institutions, and general public. In addition, it offers copyright cloud platforms, such as national digital audiovisual broadcasting service supervision platform and China international digital intellectual property monitoring and protection platform. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300370.SZ.summary: Beijing Etrol Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures smart industry, automation, and oil and gas products and solutions in China. The company offers distributed control systems, remote terminal units, expansion I/O products, and instruments, as well as specialized industrial products for the intelligent production and development in the oilfield, granary, environment protection, and chemical industries. It also delivers supervisory control and data acquisition, safety instrumented, fire and gas, emergency shutdown, security monitoring, and dispatching systems. In addition, the company offers oil and gas ground devices; products for measurement while drilling; and natural gas processing, and environmental protection in oil and gas, as well as integrated drilling and completion, and fracturing services. Further, it provides three-dimensional ecological monitoring network and application platform for dynamic data; integrated solutions to customers in informationalized and intelligent, and grain storage and transportation industries; and multi-purpose monitoring and control systems. Additionally, it provides technologies of Internet of Things, cloud computing and related equipment, communication technology and relevant products, intelligent manufacturing, etc., as well as smart campus and intelligent water products. The company also offers oil and gas field, water and waste water, city gas, coal bed methane, oil production technology, EPC, and smart park and city solutions. In addition, it provides operation and maintenance, technical consultation, investment, engineering design and system integration, solution and implementation, construction, equipment installation and commissioning, spare parts management, and performance and upgradation services. The company was formerly known as Beijing ECHO Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Etrol Technologies Co., Ltd. in February 2015. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

300371.SZ.summary: Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of ultrasonic heat meters, water meters, flow meters, and metering systems in China. It offers water meters for residential water supply, water supply management, modeling, and billing applications; and heat meters for residential, public buildings, temperature control, and billing applications. The company was formerly known as Tangshan Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. in September 2015. Huizhong Instrumentation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Tangshan, China.

300416.SZ.summary: Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. provides mechanics environmental test equipment and solutions. The company's products include electro-dynamic shakers, electro-dynamic test systems, electro-dynamic vibration test systems, multi-point test systems, life test and accelerated stress screens, multi-loading composite systems, hydraulic vibration systems, shock testers, drop test systems, vibration test systems and sensors, digital vibration controllers, auxiliary devices, slip and other tables, and automobile simulation transport and transportation vibration testers. Its products are used to simulate the vibration, shock, collision, and falling environmental conditions to assess the reliability of the quality of industrial products. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Sushi Testing Instrument Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

300417.SZ.summary: Nanhua Instruments Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells vehicle test equipment in China. The company offers vehicle inspection line products, such as suspension, wheel steering angle, plate brake, speed meter, wheel load, side slip, break, multi-axle wheel load, vehicle dimension, and loaded brake testers, as well as free roller and play detector. It also offers exhaust gas analyzers, BASM detection products, VMAS/ASM/lugdown testing systems, and headlight testers. In addition, the company provides motor vehicle emission detection instruments, environmental protection detection systems, and safety detection instruments, as well as safety detection systems, including computer detection/management network control system software. It also exports its products to Asia, the United States, Europe, and other countries. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Foshan, China.

300455.SZ.summary: Beijing Ctrowell Technology Corporation Limited engages in the research and production of railway vehicle safety detection technology products. The company offers vehicle infrared axis temperature detection systems and truck running fault dynamic image detection systems, as well as AS/RS warehouse, railway MIS, and other products. Beijing Ctrowell Technology Corporation Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Beijing, China.

300456.SZ.summary: Navtech Inc. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of inertial, satellite, and integrated navigation products in China. The company also offers unmanned systems, MEMS series products, avionics, and intelligent manufacturing products. It serves the aviation and navigation, surveying and mapping, unmanned system, consumer electronic, intelligent control, weapon, scientific research and teaching, and other fields. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

300466.SZ.summary: Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. provides intelligent detection products and control systems in China. The company's Bulk Handling division offers weighing products, including high precision belt scales, floating scale belt scales, coal weighing feeders, weighing feeders, batching systems, checking equipment, weighing instruments/load cells, and other measuring equipment; bulk material detection products, such as sweep sampling, auger sampling, sample preparation and analytics, and coal sample transportation systems; and conveyor protection products comprising run off, safety pull, position, tilt, and under speed switches, as well as belt damaged detectors and motion monitor systems. Its Packaging division provides flexible and bulk packaging lines; weighing and filling products, such as multihead and linear weighers, auger fillers, and volumetric cup fillers; open mouth, valve bag, bulk bag, and premade bag packers, as well as vertical form fill seals, bulk bag dischargers, and vacuum loaders; checkweigher and metal detector inspection products; robotic, low level, and high level palletizers; and inclined, screw, take off, bet, and chain conveyors, as well as turn tables and bucket elevators. The company also provides spare parts and manuals, and field and training services; and industrial handling robots and quantitative packaging machinery. In addition, it offers pillow bag, tray, carton, bottle, open mouth bag, and bulk bag solutions for the dry and processed food, fresh food, frozen food, liquid and thick, and nonfood industries; and bulk handling solutions for the power, chemical, cement, steel, metallurgy, port, coal, and quarry industries. The company was formerly known as Saimo Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2020. Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.

300515.SZ.long_name: Hunan Sundy Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
300515.SZ.summary: Hunan Sundy Science and Technology Co., Ltd. supplies coal analysis solutions in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers bomb calorimeters; elemental analyzers, including carbon hydrogen and nitrogen, infrared sulfur, coulomb sulfur, and fluorine and chlorine analyzers; and thermogravimetric analyzers comprising loss on ignition analyzers, moisture analyzers, and intelligent muffle furnaces. It also provides ash fusion testers; hardgrove grindability index testers; sample preparation equipment, such as quick dryer, hammer crusher and divider, jaw crusher, double roll crusher, humid coal hammer crusher and divider, pulverizer, automatic divider, standard sieve shaker, environmental sieve, and crushing dividing combined products; and auto sampling systems comprising fuel management and control, integrated sampling and sample preparation system, and coal yard dynamic management and control systems. In addition, the company offers preceding stage sample preparation, online total moisture test, automatic sample storing and checking cabinet, dust extraction, and coal quality management systems, as well as stationery laser and unmanned aerial vehicle stockpile inventorying equipment. Its products are used in coal and coke, biomass fuel, food and feed, and environmental applications. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

300516.SZ.long_name: Hubei Jiuzhiyang Infrared System Co., Ltd
300516.SZ.summary: Hubei Jiuzhiyang Infrared System Co., Ltd engages in the research, production, and marketing of infrared thermal imagers in China. The company offers uncooled and cooled infrared imagers; laser range finders; and hand-held and physical thermoscopes. Its products are used in the areas of marine surveillance, law enforcement, security and protection monitoring, forest fire prevention, supervising and rescue for aquatic transportation, search and rescue, industrial detection, inspection and quarantine, assistant driving, etc. The company is based in Wuhan, China.

300552.SZ.summary: Beijing Wanji Technology Co., Ltd. provides intelligent transportation systems in China. The company offers ETC products, such as on board units, release devices, and roadside units, as well as V2X, a product that connects Internet of vehicles and automatic drive; and weigh-in-motion products, including toll-by-weight, overweight measurement, direct enforcement, instrument panel, LiDAR axle recognizer, and integrated management platform. It also provides LiDAR range of products for use in traffic condition survey, vehicle detection outline size detection and measurement, and vehicle classification systems; and electronic registration identification systems, which include RFID readers and antennas. In addition, the company offers big data products for use in overloading management, traffic, and logistics applications. Beijing Wanji Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300567.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Jingce Electronic Group Co., Ltd.
300567.SZ.summary: Wuhan Jingce Electronic Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale flat panel display inspection systems. The company's principal products include module inspection systems, panel inspection systems, OLED inspection systems, AOI optical inspection systems, and flat panel display automation equipment. The company was formerly known as Wuhan Jingce Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuhan Jingce Electronic Group Co., Ltd. in November 2017. Wuhan Jingce Electronic Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

300572.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Anche Technologies Co., Ltd. provides motor vehicle inspection, industry regulation and supervision, driver examination system, and intelligent maintenance industry services and management solutions in China. It offers motor vehicle inspection systems, such as motor vehicle testing line, security line equipment, inspection line, comprehensive inspection line, loop inspection line, motorized inspection line, and maintenance equipment; industry supervision networking platform; motor vehicle driver examination systems; automobile factory test equipment, including new vehicle testing line, new energy automobile testing line, rain testing room, four-wheel positioning, and vehicle washing machines; and vehicle inspection appointment system. The company is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300590.SZ.summary: Queclink Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd. supplies wireless machine-to-machine devices and solutions worldwide. The company offers asset trackers, personal trackers, vehicle trackers, accessories, and animal identification tags, as well as ODM services. It provides products for automotive tracking, fleet management, tracking and tracing, lone worker safety, mobile health care, remote monitoring and control of various assets, and wireless alarms to cover applications through the Internet. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300627.SZ.summary: Shanghai Huace Navigation Technology Ltd. operates as a GNSS positioning technology and products company in China and internationally. The company offers GNSS survey and engineering products, as well as software solutions for high precision surveying and positioning, engineering, mapping, GIS data collection, road stakeout, and pipeline surveying; GIS data collection products; GNSS infrastructures; unmanned aircraft systems; and precision agricultural products for various applications and industries, such as auto-steering, ditching, ridging, seeding, inter-tillage, etc. It also provides rugged total stations for optical surveying; and vehicle-independent mobile mapping solutions, as well as products for marine construction industry. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300747.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Raycus Fiber Laser Technologies Co.,Ltd.
300747.SZ.summary: Wuhan Raycus Fiber Laser Technologies Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells high power fiber lasers and devices in the People's Republic of China. The company offers single module CW fiber, short-pulse fiber, fiber delivered direct diode laser, quasi-continuous fiber, 10-100W Q-switched pulse fiber, and high-power multimode continuous fiber lasers. It also exports its products to Asia, Europe, the United States, the Middle East, and internationally. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

300807.SZ.summary: Zhengzhou Tiamaes Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of vehicle electronic products for urban public transport smart solutions. Its products include fare box and cashier counting machines; on-board computers, driving recorders, intelligent passenger counters, LED screens, and section station apparatus products; electronic bus-stop boards and guiding screens; and scheduling screens, dispatching terminals, and bus dispatching communication machines. The company also offers software products, such as enterprise resource management comprehensive information management system, urban public traffic intelligent application platform, bus comprehensive operation detecting monitoring platform, bus cashier system, bus intelligent dispatching system, travel services mobile client, bus operation monitoring platform, bus oiling management system, intelligent fare collection management cloud platform, passenger flow scheduling analysis system, and energy charging monitoring system solutions. It serves bus companies and cities. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.

300862.SZ.summary: Anhui Landun Photoelectron Co., Ltd. researches and produces analytical measuring instruments. The company offers transportation products, such as speed measuring products, cameras, fill light products, intelligent management systems, information release products, signal light and machine products, and traffic weather collection products; traffic front-end subsystems; and software platform. It also provides application solutions, and operation and maintenance services in the fields of intelligent transportation, smart environmental protection, intelligent weather, and food and drug safety. The company is headquartered in Tongling, China.

300880.SZ.summary: Ningbo Jianan Electronics Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of smart meters, electricity information collection terminals, and energy metering boxes. Its products include single- and three-phase smart meters, intelligent power management terminals, electric energy metering boxes, distribution network automation equipment, charging piles, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Cixi, China.

300897.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Seck Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. primarily manufactures and processes meter reading system products and rotor wet long-distance cold water meters. The company engages in the electronic computer and system integration, and technology development, as well as technical development of smart water meter systems and software, and water automation and information systems. It is also involved in the installation of intelligent water meters and meter reading systems; wholesale and retail of electronic products, instruments, and water supply equipment; and import and export of goods. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300906.SZ.long_name: Jiangxi Everbright Measurement Control Technology Co.,Ltd
300906.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Everbright Measurement Control Technology Co.,Ltd manufactures track inspection instrument, track measuring instrument, track testing equipment combination, and other testing equipment. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China. Jiangxi Everbright Measurement Control Technology Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Jiangxi Riyueming Industrial Co., Ltd.

3059.TW.summary: Altek Corporation engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of digital image technology application products. The company provides AI cameras and edge boxes, and PI cameras for home, banking and finance, hotel, retail, and industrial applications; imaging chips for image quality enhancement, face detection, etc.; and 3D sensing modules and solutions for robots, augmented reality/virtual reality devices, surveillance devices, and face payment systems. It offers automobile camera systems, including image assistance system/ mega pixel HD camera, IR camera, AVM, and ADAS for driver monitoring system; and medical imaging solutions, such as glucose meter, intelligent insulin delivery system, and disposable endoscope camera system. In addition, the company offers optical components; manufactures and sells digital still cameras and its accessories; research, development, manufacture, and sale of medical electronic equipment; wholesale, import, and export of digital cameras, digital video cameras, and related accessories; and research, design, and sales of imaging technologies, and electronic software and hardware. It operates in Asia, Europe, the United States, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Asia Imagination Corporation and changed its name to Altek Corporation in February 1997. Altek Corporation was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4NK.F.summary: Norbit ASA provides technology products and solutions in Norway and internationally. The company offers monitoring and detection services for maritime, and offshore oil and gas projects; consultancy services; sensors and systems for monitoring, detection, and reporting tasks; and SeaCOP software system for monitoring, detection, and emergency response for maritime and offshore operations. Its products include DSRC 2G, a short range communication device; VTM 745, a DSRC module for enforcement in GNSS based tolling; connectivity modules for smart tachographs; desktop readers; road side units; and reclosable fasteners. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of electronic manufacturing services, such as pure circuit board assembly, cable and wire harness, and fabrication of products and systems; and original design manufacturing services under the NORBIT brand. Norbit ASA was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Trondheim, Norway.

5933.T.summary: Alinco Incorporated develops, manufactures, and sells scaffolding equipment in Japan and internationally. The company develops, manufactures, and sells do-it-yourself products, aluminum molds, home appliances, and radio communication equipment; and sells fitness equipment. It is also involved in the rental of construction scaffolding, Octo-system, and other temporary equipment. The company was formerly known as Inoue Iron Works Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Alinco Incorporated in March 1983. The company was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

5LN.F.summary: Rolling Optics Holding AB (publ) develops, designs, produces, and sells products in visual authentication based on in-house developed and patented technology in micro-optics. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Solna, Sweden.

5PF.SI.summary: Jason Marine Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides marine electronics systems integration and support services for the marine and offshore oil and gas industries. The company operates in Sale of Goods, Rendering of Services, and Airtime Revenue segments. The Sale of Goods segment engages in the design, supply, and sale of marine, communication, navigation, and automation equipment. The Rendering of Services segment provides maintenance and support services, including repair works, troubleshooting, commissioning, radio survey, and annual performance tests. The Airtime Revenue segment offers airtime for the satellite communication systems. The company offers CCTVs; PABX systems; PAGA systems for individual project specifications; GMDSS A3 solutions; VSAT systems; LAN systems; entertainment systems; Helideck monitoring systems and weather monitoring systems; UHF network systems; collision avoidance radar systems; microwave systems; and non-directional beacons, as well as search and rescue systems, and vessel and ship health monitoring systems. It has operations in Singapore, the People's Republic of China, Indonesia, Malaysia, Germany, Denmark, and internationally. Jason Marine Group Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Singapore.

603279.SS.summary: Jingjin Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells filter press machines and related equipment for use in environmental protection, chemical engineering, food, pharmaceutical, metallurgy, and coal industry. Its products include filter press, low temperature dryer, filter press, filter plate, filter press auxiliary system, filter press accessories, filter equipment, and filter cloth. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Dezhou, China.

603297.SS.summary: Ningbo Yong Xin Optics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells optical instruments and components in China. It offers optical microscopes and optical components used for various applications in optical and electronic products, such as bar-code scanners, motion optics, automotive driving, high-end cameras, HD projection, teaching, life sciences, semiconductors, etc. The company offers its products under the NOVEL, JIANGNAN, and NEXCOPE brands. It also exports its products to approximately 100 countries. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Yongxin Optical Instrument Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Yong Xin Optics Co., Ltd. in 2000. Ningbo Yong Xin Optics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Ningbo, China.

603421.SS.summary: Qingdao Topscomm Communication INC. designs, researches and develops, manufactures, and sells smart products for electric power and fire protection primarily in China. The company offers smart energy meters, such as smart prepayment and advanced metering infrastructure (AMI), and conventional meters; communication terminals, including data collectors and concentrators, and communication converters; energy data acquisition, distribution automation, power quality, and renewable energy systems; and communication chips and modules. It also provides AMI, prepayment vending, water/gas/heat and electricity meter AMR/AMI, distribution automation and management, and low and medium voltage PLC communication solutions. In addition, the company offers billing management, photovoltaic power management, and wind turbine control systems; and data collection operation and maintenance, line loss management, engineering installation, operation and distribution coordination, and power design services. Its products are used in the fields of smart grid, smart metering, new energy, fire protection, smart home, etc. Qingdao Topscomm Communication INC. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

6424.T.summary: Takamisawa Cybernetics Company, Ltd. manufactures and sells multi-functional automatic ticket vending machines in Japan. It offers ticket vending machines, ticket issuing machines, and smart card charging terminals for railway station services; and ticket printing modules, banknote handling devices, coin handling devices, and card handling modules for use in the banking or retail industry. The company also provides entrance/exit control gate systems for leisure facilities; security gates for access to buildings, offices, etc.; card vending machines; and bicycle parking lot management systems. In addition, it offers open door temperature control chambers, access control solutions, earthquake disaster prevention equipment, and measuring instruments and apparatus for applications in public facilities, local governments, or corporations. Takamisawa Cybernetics Company, Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6436.T.summary: Amano Corporation provides time information, parking, environmental, and cleaning systems in Japan, North America, and internationally. It operates through Time Information System Business and Environment System Business segments. The company's time information systems include time and attendance (T&A), payroll, human resource, and access information systems; and T&A and access information terminals, PC interfaced time recorders, time recorders, electronic time stamps, and T&A/payroll/HR cloud services. It also provides parking systems, such as gate-type, flap-lock, bicycle parking, vehicle guidance, parking lot management, and security gate systems, as well as offers parking facility data center and commissioned management services. In addition, the company offers environmental systems consisting of energy and space-saving pulse-jet, all stainless steel body, and dust explosion pressure diffusion type dust collectors; electric mist collectors; dust collectors for welding work; and volatile organic compounds removal, pneumatic powder conveying, and large-scale dust collection systems. Further, it provides cleaning systems, including autonomous robotic floor, compact automatic floor, and ride-on automatic scrubbers; commercial robotic vacuum, carpet, and industrial vacuum cleaners; and hand-pushed sweepers, electronic high-speed burnishers, and floor polishers. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

6644.T.summary: Osaki Electric Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, sells, and installs measurement and control equipment in Japan, rest of Asia, the Oceania, Europe, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Measurement and Control Equipment, Flat Panel Display Assembly Equipment, and Real Estate. The company offers residential and commercial metering devices, such as smart meters and gas meters; and a range of low voltage switchgear systems, including distribution boards, sub-boards, floor stand boards, motor control sensors, and power distribution units. It also provides information and communication related products consisting of optical couplers and switches, optical distributing frames, and electric power distribution panels and shelters. In addition, the company offers software, and related products and services, such as demand control equipment, head end systems, meter data management systems, and data visualization products. Further, it rents real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Kogyo Seisakujo and changed its name to Osaki Electric Co., Ltd. in April 1941. Osaki Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1916 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6709.T.summary: Meisei Electric Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells communication, electronic, electric measuring, information processing, other electric and electronic instruments, machineries, and parts in Japan and internationally. It also offers physical and chemical equipment, precision equipment, and others; and computer software. The company's products include radiosonde equipment, automatic radiosonde systems, automated meteorological data acquisition systems, visibility meters, and compact weather stations; and water management technology solutions, including telemetry systems, water discharge warning systems, dam data processing systems, etc. Its products also consist of disaster prevention information systems, QCAST earthquake early warning systems, landslide alert facility systems, external system control seismometers, and seismic intensity meters; neutron monitoring instruments, including space observation units; air-traffic control equipment, such as airport meteorological observing systems, air traffic control systems, and control tower systems for emergency; and space technology diversion for ground equipment. In addition, it offers products in the fields of rocket monitoring used for launching and control devices, as well as satellite-mounted devices, including rocket-mounted cameras, picture compressor equipment, hot gas valve motor controllers, and power sequence distribution boxes; and measuring instruments for various tests and training of military equipment, as well as provides various testing services for assessment of vibration and environmental resistance during launch and thermal design, performance, etc. in space for satellite and rocket components. The company was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Isesaki, Japan. Meisei Electric Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of IHI Corporation.

6721.T.summary: Wintest Corporation develops, designs, and sells inspection equipment for image sensors and display driver ICs in Japan, China, and Taiwan. It offers organic EL / various LCD / LCOS inspection devices, LCD driver IC inspection devices, image sensor (CCD / CIS) inspection systems, mixed-signal devices, inspection apparatus, speakers, digital output CMOS image sensors, logic IC inspection equipment, and analog mixed signal IC inspection equipment. The company is also involved in the solar panel cleaning and coating, environmental equipment sales and maintenance, and insurance handling and consulting businesses. It offers its products to semiconductor, LCD driver, and FPD manufacturers. Wintest Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

6742.T.summary: Kyosan Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, sells, and services railway signal equipment, road traffic signal equipment, and power conversion equipment in Japan and internationally. It offers railway signal systems, including train control and detection equipment, interlocking equipment, block systems, field equipment, level crossing protection equipment, total traffic control systems, maintenance equipment, power supply for signaling systems, and railway-related equipment. The company also provides safeguards for passenger transfer area; passenger information display devices; traffic management systems, such as road traffic control systems, road traffic signal controllers, road traffic signal units, traffic/pedestrian sensors, and other devices. In addition, it offers power conversion systems comprising digitally controlled RF systems and DC converters; uninterruptible power supplies for signal; and power supplies for communications devices. The company was formerly known as Tokyo Denki Kogyo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kyosan Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. in 1926. Kyosan Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1917 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

6777.T.summary: Santec Corporation produces and sells optical components, optical instruments, optical coherence tomography (OCT) systems, and PC software in Japan and rest of Asia, North America, and Europe. The company offers optical instruments, including tunable lasers, tunable filters, optical test and measurement equipment, and laboratory components; and a range of OCT solutions comprising OCT imaging systems, sources, detectors, and probes. It also provides optical components and integrated optical submodules, such as optical power monitors, MUX/DEMUX, optical variable attenuators, filter chips, optical submodules, and spatial light modulators; and fiber optic HDMI video extenders. The company's products are used in optical communication, medical imaging, opto-electronics, optical instruments, AV cable, and white papers markets. The company was formerly known as Samcom Electronics Corporation and changed its name to Santec Corporation in June 1983. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Komaki, Japan. Santec Corporation is a subsidiary of Kyowa Exeo Corporation.

6814.T.summary: Furuno Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of marine equipment, industrial electronics equipment, wireless LAN system, and handy terminals in Japan, the Americas, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It offers radars, AIS and ECDIS systems, and satellite communication equipment for merchant vessels; fish finders, scanning sonars, and radiotelephones for fishing vessels; and navigation systems, GPS and chart plotters, fish finders, and autopilot systems for sport fishing boats, sailboats, and yachts. The company also provides medical equipment devices, such as ultrasound bone densitometers and clinical chemical analyzers; and automotive ETC2.0/ETC systems, dedicated short range communication systems, GPS receivers, and GPS disciplined oscillators. In addition, it offers meteorological monitoring and analyzing systems, and global navigation satellite system displacement monitoring systems; and wireless LAN access points and wireless handheld terminals, as well as provides electromagnetic environment testing services. Furuno Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Nishinomiya, Japan.

6848.T.summary: Dkk-Toa Corporation manufactures and sells measuring instruments in Japan and internationally. The company offers analytical instruments, such as laboratory analyzers, and portable and handheld analyzers; and industrial, environmental, medical, and other measuring and analytical instruments. It also provides process analyzers; analyzers for water and waste water treatment, boiler water applications, and oil refineries; water quality analyzers/systems and ambient air/emission gas analyzers; and pH measurement and oxidation-reduction potential measurement products. In addition, the company manufactures and sells toxic and deleterious agents and reagents; undertakes contracts for instrumentation, electrical, telecommunications, and other related works; and provides real estate rental services. Dkk-Toa Corporation was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6850.T.summary: Chino Corporation manufactures and sells instrumentation and control equipment. Its products include temperature sensors, infrared radiation thermometers, temperature calibration equipment, traceability, temperature/humidity meters and sensors, constituent/moisture/thickness meters, data loggers, controllers/indicators, recorders, thyristor regulators, fuel cell testing systems, compressor performance testing systems, and instrumentation components. The company was formerly known as CHINO Works, Ltd. and changed its name to Chino Corporation in 1986. Chino Corporation was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6856.T.summary: HORIBA, Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive test, process and environmental, medical-diagnostics, semiconductor, and scientific instruments and systems. Its Automotive Test Systems segment offers emission measurement systems, driveline test systems, automotive emissions analyzers, engine test and brake test systems, and fuel cell and battery test systems; provides vehicle development engineering and testing engineering services; and leases and manages R&D facilities. The company's Process & Environmental Instruments & Systems segment provides stack gas analyzers, industrial water quality analyzers, water quality analysis and examination systems, air pollution analyzers, environmental radiation monitors, and process measurement equipment. Its Medical-Diagnostic Instruments & Systems segment offers hematology and CRP, immunology, clinical chemistry, and blood glucose analyzers. The company's Semiconductor Instruments & Systems segment provides mass flow controllers, chemical concentration monitors, reticle/mask particle detection systems, residual gas analyzers, and vaporizers. Its Scientific Instruments & Systems segment offers Raman spectrometers, pH meters, particle-size distribution analyzers, X-Ray fluorescence analyzers, elemental analyzers, fluorescence spectroscopy/fluorescence lifetime spectroscopy, optical components, spectrometers and detectors, and gratings. HORIBA, Ltd. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

6858.T.summary: Ono Sokki Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells electronic measuring instruments in Japan and internationally. It provides automotive test systems, flow meters, GPS speed meters, and engine tachometers; sound level meters, microphones, amps, accelerometers, vibration comparators, and laser doppler vibrometers; and torque detectors, torque converters, and motor torques. In addition, it offers digital linear gages, non-contact thickness meters, and rotary and roller encoders; revolving detectors and indicators, speedometers, and portable tachometers; and FFT analyzers and data station software. Further, the company provides custom-made test equipment for R&D and quality control applications; and acoustic/vibration consulting services, after-sales services, engineering services, etc. Ono Sokki Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1940 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

6859.T.summary: Espec Corp. manufactures and sells environmental test chambers worldwide. The company offers temperature and humidity chambers/rapid-rate thermal cycle chambers, thermal shock chambers, and Web integrated network systems. It also provides secondary battery-related equipment; measurement and evaluation systems, and semiconductor-related equipment; and indoor farm and growth chambers. In addition, the company offers after-sales and engineering, and laboratory testing services; and analysis, calibration, and equipment rental and resale services. Espec Corp. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

6861.T.summary: Keyence Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells factory automation solutions worldwide. The company offers photoelectric, fiber optic, laser, positioning, vision, and inductive proximity sensors, as well as network communication units used for presence/absence and part differentiation applications. It also provides measurement sensors, such as laser displacement and profiler, optical/laser micrometer, 3D interference measurement, spectral interference displacement, and contact displacement/LVDT sensors; and measurement systems, including optical comparators, 3D scanners, and CMM/laser trackers. In addition, the company offers safety products comprising safety laser scanners, light curtains, interlock switches, and controllers to protect operators from machine hazards; and pressure, flow, level, and temperature sensors for monitoring equipment processes. Further, it provides static eliminators/ionizers and electrostatic sensors which protect workers, machinery, and products from the damaging effects of electrostatic charge; vision systems and sensors, and barcode scanners to perform automatic inspection and part identification; and programmable logic controllers and other controls that are used for machine control applications. Additionally, the company offers laser marking systems/laser markers and industrial continuous inkjet printers; digital, 3D laser scanning, and fluorescence microscopes, as well as wide-area 3D measuring systems for industrial and life science applications; and handheld mobile computers. It serves customers in automotive/chassis assembly, metals/machining, FPD/glass, semiconductor/ICS, plastic/molding, food/pharmaceutical, steel, and other industries. Keyence Corporation was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

6863.T.summary: Nireco Corporation provides process control, Web control, and inspection systems in Japan. It offers control and measuring systems, including electro-hydraulic actuators, eddy current level meters, thickness measuring systems, metal industry related edge position control systems, and automatic marking systems for steel and non-ferrous metal production lines. The company also provides Web control products, which include printing film related edge position control systems, tension control systems, automatic register control systems, print-to-cut register control systems, printing quality inspection systems, and gluing control systems. In addition, it offers inspection systems, such as defect inspection systems for plain surfaces, pouch packaging inspection systems, near-infrared ray analysis systems, image processing and analysis systems, and fruit and vegetable quality analysis systems, as well as fish selectors. The company was formerly known as Nippon Regulator Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nireco Corporation in November 1984. Nireco Corporation was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Hachioji, Japan.

6866.T.summary: Hioki E.E. Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, sells, and services electrical measuring instruments worldwide. The company offers automatic test equipment for testing of electronic circuit boards, and boards with embedded active and passive devices. It also provides data recording equipment for development of transport-related equipment, as well as monitoring and detecting equipment malfunctions. In addition, the company offers electronic measuring equipment for testing electronic components and evaluation of the quality of energy-saving equipment and power supplies; and field measuring instruments for performing maintenance and inspection of electrical work and equipment. Further, it provides data acquisition oscilloscopes, multichannel and compact data loggers, residence meters and battery testers, LCR and capacitance meters, impedance analyzers, super megohmmeters, electrometers, picoammeters, electrical safety testers, digital multi meters, signal generators, high precision power meters, power quality analyzers and power loggers, RGB laser optical meters, LED optical meters, and LAN cable testers, as well as hipot, insulation, and leakage testers. Additionally, the company offers current probes and sensors, magnetic field meters, infrared thermometers, temperature meters, insulation testers, clamp multi meters, ground resistance testers, phase rotation meters, and voltage detectors; solar panel and photovoltaic system maintenance testers; bare board/package/populated board testing products; meter relays, CTs, and shunts; specialized solutions; and other electrical measuring instruments. Its products are used in the automotive, environmental and alternative energy, and electronic components; and other applications, such as construction and facilities, household appliances, office, communications, chemical, food product, and pharmaceutical and medical research. The company was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Ueda, Japan.

6874.T.summary: Kyoritsu Electric Corporation offers various systems, testing and measuring instruments, etc. primarily in Japan. It provides process automation products, such as integrated production control systems, network-based control systems, and compact control systems, as well as flow, pressure, and temperature sensors; and factory automation products and services comprising Web camera monitoring systems and system integration services.
